docs.lead_paragraph: Richard Rodgers was an American master and his memorial is his music. He affected, and even after his death he will continue to affect, all of our lives. How often do we hear, and do we quote his songs -- his music as well as the matching lyrics by Lorenz Hart and Oscar Hammerstein 2d? When one discusses the genius of Rodgers, there is the irresistible temptation to ...

headline.main: STAGE VIEW; Richard Rodgers, 1902-1979 --His Memorial Is His Music STAGE VIEW Richard Rodgers

docs.snippet: Lynn Deborah Sofia, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Alan J. Sofia of Harrison, N.Y., was married yesterday to Horacio A. Lertora, son of Mr. and Mrs. Augusto Lertora of Buenos Aires and Guatemala City. The Rev. Lawrence M. Orson performed the ceremony at...
docs.lead_paragraph: Lynn Deborah Sofia, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Alan J. Sofia of Harrison, N.Y., was married yesterday to Horacio A. Lertora, son of Mr. and Mrs. Augusto Lertora of Buenos Aires and Guatemala City. The Rev. Lawrence M. Orson performed the ceremony at St. Joseph's Roman Catholic Church in Bronxville, N.Y.

docs.snippet: HOUSTON, Jan. 11 (AP) Three oil executives, including Oscar S. Wyatt Jr., head of the giant Coastal Corporation, each drew $40,000 fines today after entering pleas of guilty to violating Federal crude oil pricing regulations....
docs.lead_paragraph: HOUSTON, Jan. 11 (AP) Three oil executives, including Oscar S. Wyatt Jr., head of the giant Coastal Corporation, each drew $40,000 fines today after entering pleas of guilty to violating Federal crude oil pricing regulations.
docs.abstract: Pleas of guilty to violating Federal crude oil pricing regulations are entered by Oscar S Wyatt, chairman of Coastal Corp, Sam F Willson, Coastal senior vice president, and David B Chalmers, president of Coral Petroleum; Coastal Slates Crude Gathering enters plea of no contest while Coral and a 2d Coastal subsidiary, Holborn Oil Co, enter pleas of guilty; Judge George E Cire fines 3 executives $40,000 each under plea-bargaining agreement; fines Coastal States Crude, Holborn and Coral $10,000 each, orders Holborn and Coral to pay $1 million each in civil penalties and directs Coastal Corp and Coral to refund $9 million each to Energy Department (S)
